item.title: Using Python to solve the snake cube puzzle
item.description: Code: github A few days ago, a friend challenged me with this innocuous snake-looking puzzle cube: The rules are simple, rotate the cubes however you like to form a 3x3x3 cube. After banging my head on this for a few hours, I decided to put the damn thing to rest by solving it using a computer program. My approach was to basically brute force the puzzle by trying one rotation after another while providing certain constraints.
